subject: Re: [junit] Test Suite labeling....
msgSnippet: Specify a test suite name on the TestSuite() constructor, as in... TestSuite suite = new TestSuite( MyTestSuite ); suite.addTest(...); return suite; The
messageBody:
Specify a test suite name on the TestSuite() constructor, as in...

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite("MyTestSuite");
suite.addTest(...);
return suite;

The TestSuite.toString() method will use the test suite name, if one
has been provided; otherwise, the default toString() is used.

Mike
